Package src

Class Table

java.lang.Object
src.Table
public class Table extends Object
Represents a table in the restaurant. A restaurant can have many tables. A table can only have 1 order or 1 reservation and 1 staff.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Table​(int tableNum, int tableCapacity, boolean isAvailable)
    Creates a new table for the restaurant.

  • Constructor Details

    • Table

      public Table​(int tableNum, int tableCapacity, boolean isAvailable)
      Creates a new table for the restaurant.
      Parameters:
      tableNum - This Table's number/ID.
      tableCapacity - This Table's maximum capacity.
      isAvailable - This Table's availability.

  • Method Details

    • setisAvailable

      public void setisAvailable​(boolean available)
      Changes the availability of the table. Used when customer arrives, leaves and when reservation is being made.
      Parameters:
      available - This Table's availability.

    • isAvailable

      public boolean isAvailable()
      Gets the availability of the table. Table can only be assignment when it is available.
      Returns:
      This Table's availability.

    • gettableCapacity

      public int gettableCapacity()
      Gets the maximum capacity of the table. Table cannot be assignment if the number of customer exceeds the maximum table capacity. Table capacity can only be changed through security access by authorized personnel as it is fixed to prevent staff from changing.
      Returns:
      This Table's capacity.

    • gettableNum

      public int gettableNum()
      Gets the table number/ID. Table number can only be changed through security access by authorized personnel as it is fixed and to prevent staff from changing.
      Returns:
      This Table's number/ID.
